David Perdue has been running on his business background as former chief executive officer for Dollar General stores .
Dollar General added 2,500 stores and 20,000 jobs during his four - year tenure as CEO , he said in February .
Perdue joined the company in 2003 and left in 2007 .
The company 's annual reports from that time noted the company 's ambitious plans to open 600 to 800 stores a year .
In most years during Perdue 's tenure , Dollar General exceeded those projections .
28 , 2003 , Dollar General had 6,192 stores and an estimated 53,500 full - time and part - time employees .
On March 4 , 2007 , the company had 8,260 stores and about 69,500 full - time and part - time employees .
